ingredients: 3  pears - peeled, cored and cut into wedges, 1  pomegranate, skin and light-colored membrane removed, 1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice, 2 tablespoons light brown sugar,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg,   +   1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 2 tablespoons finely chopped almonds (Optional), 4 sprigs fresh mint leaves for garnish (Optional)
nutrition: Total Fat 2g 2%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 5mg 0%, Total Carbohydrate 39g 14%, Dietary Fiber 6g 20%, Total Sugars 29g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 13mg 63%, Calcium 38mg 3%, Iron 1mg 4%, Potassium 329mg 7%
